structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: Any owner or agent who willfully violates the provisions of KRS 99A.030 shall be fined not less than twenty-five dollars ($25) nor more than two hundred dollars ($200) for each day the violation continues, or imprisoned for not more than ninety (90) days.
law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 174, sec. 9, effective July 13, 1984.
